architectural_notes: Building as a Progressive Web App for installable web experience
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- PWA app icon with igo satellite branding on dark background, circular design with satellite symbol (icon-192.dim_192x192.png)
- PWA app icon with igo satellite branding on dark background, circular design with satellite symbol (icon-512.dim_512x512.png)
- Apple touch icon with igo satellite branding, squared with rounded corners (apple-touch-icon.dim_180x180.png)

existing_features.title: Create a web app manifest file (frontend/public/manifest.json) with app metadata including name 'igo Satellite Tracker', short_name 'igo', theme_color matching the satellite theme, background_color, display mode 'standalone', and icon references for multiple sizes (192x192, 512x512)
Create a service worker (frontend/public/sw.js) that implements caching strategies for offline functionality, including cache-first for static assets (CSS, JS, images) and network-first for API calls
Update frontend/index.html to link the manifest file and include PWA-specific meta tags (apple-mobile-web-app-capable, apple-mobile-web-app-status-bar-style, mobile-web-app-capable)
Generate app icons as required images to support PWA installation with proper sizes and formats for both Android and iOS devices

new_feature_requests.summary: Convert application to Progressive Web App (PWA)
Register the service worker in the main entry point with proper error handling and update notifications
